price: Nasi tukamwokoa yeye na wenziwe wa katika safina, na tukaifanya kuwa ni Ishara kwa walimwengu wote.
arabic: فَأَنجَيۡنَٰهُ وَأَصۡحَٰبَ ٱلسَّفِينَةِ وَجَعَلۡنَٰهَآ ءَايَةٗ لِّلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: fa-anjaynāhu wa-aṣḥāba al-safīnati wajaʿalnāhā āyatan lil'ʿālamīna
